name: freshcss
author: Rob Middleton
description: This add-on allows you to reload all the CSS stylesheets in a page quickly without reloading the page. You can press the F6 hotkey (or any hotkey you set) or click the button in the add-on bar (or wherever you move it to).

preferences.name: hotkey
preferences.title: Hotkey or key combo ex: 'ctrl-alt-meta-shift-r' default: 'f6'
